de.tud.android.locpairs
Class LobbyActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      de.tud.android.locpairs.LobbyActivity

public class LobbyActivity
extends Activity

Lobby. Here players meet each other and see the different teams. Game will start automatically.

Author:
Stefan Wagner
